title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: Nationals Leader Michael McCormack has told Sky News additional payments for farmers being kicked off the Farm Household Allowance is not government policy, but it's what his party is pushing for. Mr McCormack admitted he doesn't know how much a supplementary payment policy would cost but said "watch this space... we've got a good package of announcements to be made". The Expenditure Review Committee of Cabinet meets today to discuss further options to assist with the drought. Image: News Corp Australia
